mapper.select: select id,user_id,user_name,activity_id,competition_item_id,competition_type,create_time,apply_status,production_name,apply_group,apply_year_group,real_name,birthday,sex,school_name,class_company,recommened_company,card_type,card_number,telephone,mobile_phone,email,postcode,address,idea_desc,file_name,file_path,scriptwriter,director,camerist,editor,musician,artist,main_stuff,team_desc,approve_status,approve_user_id,approve_user_name,approve_time,approve_type,final_point,final_status,review_point,vdef1,vdef2,vdef3,vdef4,vdef5,vdef6,vdef7 from user_completion_item_apply where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.delete: delete from user_completion_item_apply where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.select:
SELECT apply.id AS id, item. NAME AS itemName, dic. NAME AS itemStatus, USER.user_name AS userName, apply.real_name AS realName, apply.production_name AS proName, org. NAME AS orgName, dic3.name AS applyGroup, dic2.name AS applyYearGroup, apply.approve_status as approveStatus, apply.approve_user_name as approveUserName, date_format(apply.approve_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as approveTime, apply.review_point as reviewPoint, apply.file_path as filePath, apply.approve_type as approveType, apply.idea_desc as ideaDesc, apply.vdef3 as vdef3, apply.vdef4 as vdef4, apply.competition_type as competitionType FROM user_completion_item_apply apply JOIN user_info USER ON apply.user_id = USER.id left JOIN content_category org ON apply.recommened_company = org.id JOIN competition_item item ON apply.competition_item_id = item.id JOIN dictionary dic ON apply.apply_status = dic.id left JOIN dictionary dic2 ON apply.apply_year_group =dic2.id left JOIN dictionary dic3 ON apply.apply_group =dic3.id WHERE 1 = 1 and apply.competition_item_id=#{search.itemId} and apply.apply_group=#{search.applyGroup} and apply.apply_year_group=#{search.applyYearGroup} and apply.recommened_company in(select id from content_category where path like CONCAT ('%-',#{search.orgId},'-%')) and user.user_name=#{search.userName} and apply.real_name=#{search.realName} and apply.apply_status=#{search.applyStatus} and apply.approve_status=#{search.approveResult} and apply.school_name like CONCAT("%",#{search.schoolName},"%") and (apply.vdef5 is null or apply.vdef5='') and apply.vdef5 =#{search.vdef5}
order by ${orderField} ${orderType}

SELECT apply.id AS id, item. NAME AS itemName, dic. NAME AS itemStatus, USER.user_name AS userName, apply.real_name AS realName, apply.production_name AS proName, org. NAME AS orgName, dic3.name AS applyGroup, dic2.name AS applyYearGroup, apply.approve_status as approveStatus, apply.approve_user_name as approveUserName, date_format(apply.approve_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as approveTime, apply.review_point as reviewPoint, apply.file_path as filePath, apply.approve_type as approveType, apply.idea_desc as ideaDesc, apply.vdef3 as vdef3, apply.vdef4 as vdef4 FROM user_completion_item_apply apply JOIN user_info USER ON apply.user_id = USER .id left JOIN content_category org ON apply.recommened_company = org.id JOIN competition_item item ON apply.competition_item_id = item.id JOIN dictionary dic ON apply.apply_status = dic.id left JOIN dictionary dic2 ON apply.apply_year_group =dic2.id left JOIN dictionary dic3 ON apply.apply_group =dic3.id WHERE 1 = 1 and apply.competition_item_id=#{itemId} and apply.apply_group=#{applyGroup} and apply.apply_year_group=#{applyYearGroup} and apply.recommened_company in(select id from content_category where path like CONCAT ('%-',#{orgId},'-%')) and user.user_name=#{userName} and apply.real_name=#{realName} and apply.apply_status=#{applyStatus} and apply.approve_status=#{approveResult} and apply.school_name=#{schoolName} and (apply.vdef5 is null or apply.vdef5='') and apply.vdef5 =#{vdef5}
order by ${orderField} ${orderType}

SELECT competition_type as itemType, apply_group as applyGroup, apply_year_group as applyYearGroup, count(id) as num FROM user_completion_item_apply WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND apply_group IS NOT NULL AND apply_year_group IS NOT NULL GROUP BY competition_type, apply_group, apply_year_group

SELECT apply.id AS id, item. NAME AS itemName, dic. NAME AS itemStatus, USER.user_name AS userName, apply.real_name AS realName, apply.production_name AS proName, org. NAME AS orgName, dic3.name AS applyGroup, dic2.name AS applyYearGroup, apply.approve_status as approveStatus, apply.approve_user_name as approveUserName, date_format(apply.approve_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as approveTime, apply.review_point as reviewPoint, apply.file_path as filePath, apply.approve_type as approveType, apply.idea_desc as ideaDesc, apply.vdef3 as vdef3, apply.vdef4 as vdef4, A.score as sc, apply.competition_type as competitionType FROM user_completion_item_apply apply JOIN user_info USER ON apply.user_id = USER.id left JOIN content_category org ON apply.recommened_company = org.id JOIN competition_item item ON apply.competition_item_id = item.id JOIN dictionary dic ON apply.apply_status = dic.id left JOIN dictionary dic2 ON apply.apply_year_group =dic2.id left JOIN dictionary dic3 ON apply.apply_group =dic3.id left JOIN (select sum(get_score)/count(id) as score,apply_id from user_apply_marking_result group by apply_id ) A ON apply.id=A.apply_id WHERE 1 = 1 and apply.competition_item_id=#{search.itemId} and apply.apply_group=#{search.applyGroup} and apply.apply_year_group=#{search.applyYearGroup} and apply.recommened_company in(select id from content_category where path like CONCAT ('%-',#{search.orgId},'-%')) and user.user_name=#{search.userName} and apply.real_name=#{search.realName} and apply.apply_status=#{search.applyStatus} and apply.approve_status=#{search.approveResult} and apply.school_name like CONCAT("%",#{search.schoolName},"%") and (apply.vdef5 is null or apply.vdef5='') and (apply.vdef5 =#{search.vdef5})
order by ${orderField} ${orderType}
